author: __flcl
content: A question for `engine_newPayloadV3` consumers, in case blobs do not match, we return `latestValidHash: null` as the spec suggests. Do you want us to return a real hash? Will it be more convenient for CL clients?

author: m.kalinin
content: Note that you can't return a meaningful lvh in all cases as this check is run even if the parent block is unknown to EL
